Reviews.Content: istanbul beautiful city thousands history crowne plaza location 10minute walk grand bazaar 10 minutes blue mosque haghia sophia topkapi palace byzantine cisterns located sultanahmet downside walk night taxis sultanahmet charge 23x rate hotel actually separate buildings connected courtyard functions lobby pics tripadvisor dont justice equivalent flights stairs awaits walk curb front hope bellhops arent busy arrive youll hoofing luggage five 37 steps sets stairs check youve key youll front desk tells elevator eight total buildings connect ground floor unless youll wandering halls blocks searching isnt frustration await happens 4th floor elevators 3rd floor top floor accessible spiral hotel personnel carry heavier luggage booked local convention ones left suites wife party arrive assigned top suite literally looked attic farmhouse low vaulted ceilings required careful hit heads walking corners windows circular light adequately light annoying musty mildewy smell permeated entire hotel claims refurbished hotel youve booked matter bad actually house kept mouth shut rest party arrived suites assigned lower floors easily twice size bay windows zero offending odor immediately disappointed 4th floor location smell didnt advantage fitness center pool eat breakfast day buffet quality food vary daytoday overall disappointed coffee ive future probably stay sultanahmet cafes restaurants bit hotel options chains boutique properties crowne plaza wasnt terrible mere existence ensures stars scale youre probably elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Good modern hotel -- good for kids”
Reviews.Author: Pablo034
Reviews.Content: pros modern clean hotel amenities youd expect top hotel wireless internet connection free indoor pool kids nice beds comfortable flat screen televisions restocked bottled water charge country shouldnt drink tap water kids cable television plenty channels english including disney channel service menu bit limited okay hamburger turkish food restaurant cons location easy 15min walk main sites grand bazaar hagia sophia etc near tramway immediate hotel dominated textile clothing stores catering russian buyers restaurants immediate except kebab eating dinner hotel offers babysitting services ridiculously expensive us100 hour reduce fee negotiate
